name: Eğitim İçin İngilizce Kelimeler
description: Eğitim alanında sık kullanılan İngilizce kelimeler

words.meaning: An institution for educating children
words.example: My children go to a good school.

words.meaning: A high-level educational institution in which students study for degrees and academic research is done
words.example: She studies medicine at the university.

words.meaning: A person who is studying at a school or university
words.example: He is a student at Oxford University.

words.meaning: A person who teaches, especially in a school
words.example: My math teacher is very good at explaining difficult concepts.

words.meaning: A teacher of the highest rank in a university
words.example: She is a professor of economics.

words.meaning: A period of learning or teaching
words.example: We have five lessons every day.

words.meaning: An educational talk to an audience, especially one of students in a university
words.example: I attended a lecture on modern art yesterday.

words.meaning: A series of lessons or lectures on a particular subject
words.example: I'm taking a course in Spanish.

words.meaning: An academic rank conferred by a university or college after examination or completion of a course of study
words.example: She has a degree in psychology.

words.meaning: A document bearing record of graduation from or of a degree conferred by an educational establishment
words.example: He received his diploma last week.

words.meaning: A formal test of a person's knowledge or proficiency in a subject or skill
words.example: I have an English exam tomorrow.

words.meaning: A procedure intended to establish the quality, performance, or reliability of something
words.example: We had a math test yesterday.

words.meaning: A particular level of rank, quality, proficiency, or value
words.example: She got good grades in all her subjects.

words.meaning: Schoolwork that a student is required to do at home
words.example: I have a lot of homework to do tonight.

words.meaning: A task or piece of work assigned to someone as part of a job or course of study
words.example: The assignment is due next week.

words.meaning: The devotion of time and attention to acquiring knowledge on an academic subject
words.example: I need to study for my exams.

words.meaning: Gain or acquire knowledge of or skill in (something) by study, experience, or being taught
words.example: I want to learn Spanish.

words.meaning: Impart knowledge to or instruct (someone) as to how to do something
words.example: She teaches English to foreign students.

words.meaning: The process of receiving or giving systematic instruction, especially at a school or university
words.example: A good education is important for success in life.

words.meaning: Facts, information, and skills acquired through experience or education
words.example: He has a lot of knowledge about history.

words.meaning: A branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school, college, or university
words.example: Mathematics is my favorite subject.

words.meaning: A room in which a class of students is taught
words.example: There are 30 students in our classroom.

words.meaning: A building or room containing collections of books, periodicals, and sometimes films and recorded music for use by the public or members of an institution
words.example: I go to the library to study.

words.meaning: A written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers
words.example: I'm reading a book about ancient Rome.

words.meaning: A book with blank or ruled pages for writing notes in
words.example: I write all my notes in a notebook.

words.meaning: An instrument for writing or drawing with ink
words.example: Can I borrow your pen?

words.meaning: An instrument for writing or drawing, consisting of a thin stick of graphite or a similar substance enclosed in a long thin piece of wood or fixed in a cylindrical case
words.example: I prefer to draw with a pencil.

words.meaning: The systematic investigation into and study of materials and sources in order to establish facts and reach new conclusions
words.example: She is doing research on climate change.

words.meaning: The intellectual and practical activity encompassing the systematic study of the structure and behaviour of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment
words.example: He is interested in science.

words.meaning: The abstract science of number, quantity, and space
words.example: Mathematics is a difficult subject for many students.
